data.message:
Guys, how would you display a video from a restful API? I mean, using React and Nodejs (upload file using nodejs and send to the client side the path to video). It's better use a CDN or upload locally? 

I wanna make a educational app similar to Udemy, just for study purposes. I think CDN is more easy and flexible, but a user and see the source and go to the cdn link and download the video. This make piracy a easy practice. 

Can you sugest ways to display a video and not allow the user to download it?

I generally use MERN stack in my projects.

Thanks.

Just want to make sure I understand JWT authentication flow:

1. React sends user login info to the server
2. The server creates a token and sends it back (doesn't store in db!)
3. React receives the token and stores it in localStorage or whatever
4. On each subsequent API call React retrieves the token and sends it to the server
5. The server verifies the token, checks expiration and sends back appropriate response.
6. React acts on the response received.

Hi everyone, just wanted to share my latest project with you today.

Manta is a flexible invoicing desktop app that allows you to quickly make beautiful invoices without the need of using design software like Photoshop, InDesign or Sketch. 

It's geared toward people who need to make invoices from time to time such as freelance designers, developers, photographers or writers ...

Main features:
* üèó Flexible form.
* üé® Custom designed templates which can be customized further to match your brand's style.
* üìä Export to PDF for printing or email.
* üíØ  Totally free.

If you're interested in the source code, feel free to take a look here: https://github.com/hql287/Manta.

Hope you will find this useful. 
Feedbacks, ideas and suggestions are always welcomed.

Enjoy your weekend! :)

While it would be too early to call React Native the silver bullet of mobile app development, but quick iterations, easy code sharing, and fast shipping are the perks that developers love.
The only concern about React Native is that people often complain about performance issues.
So, we did an engineering analysis of 20+ applications built with React Native and handpicked some common performance issues.
You can read the extensive analysis on the performance issues and learn how to resolve them.
Please do share if you have come across any other critical issues.

data.story: Rahul Singh shared a link to the group: ReactJS.
data.description: Learn how you can improve react native app's performance. Understand major issues and app optimization that can be done on react native applications.
